CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Voice_Bundle__c ,'Access - No Minutes'),33, IF(ISPICKVAL(Voice_Bundle__c ,'Plus - 140 minutes'),65, IF(ISPICKVAL(Voice_Bundle__c ,'Chrome - 160 Minutes'),99, IF(ISPICKVAL(Voice_Bundle__c ,'Silver - 280 Minutes'),140, IF(ISPICKVAL(Voice_Bundle__c ,'Gold - 740 Minutes'),199, IF(ISPICKVAL(Voice_Bundle__c ,'Platinum - 1,440 Minutes'),500,0))))))
CustomField.label: Voice Monthly Fee
